title: Abel Tasman Coast Track
address: Abel Tasman National Park, South Island,NZ
description: Some 30 miles of golden sand beaches, granite cliffs, and subtropical bush line this coastal track, lapped by clear azure waters where fur seals amass in play.

title: Tongariro Alpine Crossing
description: For Lord of The Rings fans, Tongariro National Park is the land of Mordor in the dark, craggy flesh.

title: Mueller Hut Route
address: Mount Cook National Park, South Island,NZ
description: The snowcapped dome of Mount Cook, New Zealand’s tallest peak at 12,316 feet, dominates the glaciated terrain rising above the path to Mueller Hut, a spare red trekker’s hut cantilevered into the side of a scree slope on a high alpine plateau.

title: Mt. Victoria Trails
description: It’s no secret that New Zealand boasts huge stretches of rugged, bucolic landscapes with more livestock than humans. But even Wellington, the Kiwi’s capital city of 450,000, is buffered by a swath of semi-wild green hills, dubbed the Town Belt, that was set aside for aesthetics and recreation in 1840.
